markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Red Commander Ant](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1838)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Second only to the hive's queen, red commanders hold absolute authority over the hive's other ants. Although no red commander can give orders to another, they nevertheless work in an eerie coordination to fulfill their missions as effectively as possible. They have a sense of adaptability and self-preservation that might lead them to abandon a dangerous task, even if doing so costs the lives of lower-ranking ants. Red commanders tend to show glimmers of individuality that other red ants don't, such as by marking their chitinous exoskeletons with commemorations of past battles and martial victories.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Beast](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 41

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 39

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 36
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/GiganticAnt_RedCommanderAnt.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 17">[Red Commander Ant](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1838)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Huge" />
<trait label="Beast" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=20" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #174: Shadows of the Ancients](/Sources.aspx?ID=115) pg. 73</row>

**Perception** +30; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 60 feet

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +30, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +32, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +32, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +29, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +29

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +9

**Dex** +5

**Con** +6

**Int** +0

**Wis** +6

**Cha** +9
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 40 

**Fort** +29 

**Ref** +28 

**Will** +31 

</row>

**HP** 315

**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** <actions string="Reaction" /> 

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet, climb 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
mandibles +33 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d10+17 slashing plus [Improved Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=27)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
stinger +33 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d6+17 piercing plus red ant venom

**[Constrict](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=10)** <actions string="Single Action" />  5d10, DC 38. Before using Constrict, the ant can choose to smash one creature that it has [Grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=33) against the ground. That creature uses the result one degree of success worse than its Fortitude save result against Constrict, but it is then no longer grabbed or restrained by the ant.

**For the Queen!** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Olfactory](/Traits.aspx?ID=246)) The red commander ant gives a pheromone signal to spur other ants into a fury. All ants within 30 feet who can smell this signal gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, reduce their [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) condition to 0, and are immune to the frightened condition for 1 minute.

**Red Ant Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 38 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 4 rounds; **Stage 1** 3d6 poison and [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) (1 round); **Stage 2** 4d6 poison and enfeebled 2 (1 round); **Stage 3** 6d6 poison and enfeebled 3 (1 round)

**The Queen's Enemy** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) The red commander ant designates a single creature within 60 feet that it can see as its queen's enemy. All ants within 120 feet of the red commander ant deal an additional 1d8 [bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) when they hit the target with mandibles Strikes. These effects last for 1 minute, or until the red commander ant uses The Queen's Enemy on a different creature.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-304" />
name: Red Commander Ant
